issue.title: Remove AE library from plasma header files.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3605](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3605). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Users of `plasma/events.h` won't have access to `ae.h` so we need to remove it from the header file.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3605?focusedCommentId=16663312) by Philipp Moritz (pcmoritz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2826
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2826>
